description: woman seated at right on rocks looking left; wears dress and elaborate headdress; gestures with right hand, landscape at left with low horizon line
inscription:
Inscription

at lower right in brown ink: [Sibillo / Egiptia  / de Mater / Deus]; in graphite: [40];
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash on laid paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, July 8, 1964, no. 39. [Alister Mathews, Bournemouth, England, by 1974; sold for Â£25, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1974-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Sibyl in a Landscape
